meanings.definition: The sister of one's father or mother.
meanings.sent1: My aunty always bakes delicious cookies for me.
meanings.sent2: I visited my aunty during the school holidays.
meanings.sent3: When my aunty dances, she looks like a graceful swan.
meanings.sent4: Her love and care enveloped me like a warm hug from an aunty.
meanings.sent5: The memories of playing with my aunty are etched in my heart forever.

meanings.definition: A term of endearment for a woman who is a close friend or relative of one's parents.
meanings.sent1: My best friend's mom is like an aunty to me.
meanings.sent2: I love spending time with my aunty at family gatherings.
meanings.sent3: My aunty's jokes always make us laugh until our stomachs hurt.
meanings.sent4: She is the aunty of our neighborhood, always ready to help anyone in need.
meanings.sent5: The warmth of her smile makes her the favorite aunty of all the kids.
